geombeer 0.0.1

Creates an image of a red wine bottle

geom_whitewine.Rd

Creates an image of a red wine bottle

geom_whitewine(length = 10)

Arguments

length

Consumes numeric vector

Value

Returns an image of a bottle of white wine can when used with ggplot2

Examples

geom_whitewine(10)

#> [[1]]
#> mapping: x = ~-x + 1.5, y = ~y, xend = ~x - 1.5, yend = ~y
